user.title: Breathe Audio Elevate 6.6
user.description:
Set up your Breathe Audio Elevate 6.6 multi-zone amplifier.

For the Serial Port, select from the list or type a custom path (e.g., /dev/serial/by-id/...).

data_description.serial_port: Select from detected ports or type a custom path (e.g., /dev/serial/by-id/usb-FTDI_FT232R_USB_UART_BG02QFFJ-if00-port0)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please check the serial port
